alert.note: Alert for East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 22 at 9:58PM MDT until April 24 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Wyoming and panhandle Nebraska. * WHEN...From 9 AM Saturday to midnight MDT Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County
